Texts.Chs: 把^orange;啤酒花^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;hops^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 接下来你会用到^orange;啤酒花^reset;。种植并收获至少^orange;2个啤酒花^reset;。没有^orange;啤酒花^reset;就没法酿^green;啤酒^reset;，不喝啤酒，我浑身难受！
Texts.Eng: For the next steps you'll need some ^orange;Hops^reset;. Make them grow and gather at least 2 ^orange;Hops^reset;. Because without ^orange;hops^reset;, we get no ^green;beer^reset;. And without beer we cry.

Texts.Chs: 一个好的开始。请务必收集一些小麦，因为你下一步会需要到它。
Texts.Eng: That's a good start. Be sure to keep some wheat as you'll need it next.
